genre_description: A near-future psychological drama focusing on the use of advanced therapeutic AI for trauma recovery, grief processing, and legal advocacy.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system delivered via earpiece and holographic projection, designed to assist trauma survivors with emotional regulation, memory processing, and biometric monitoring.

behaviors.description: Monitors Isa's biometrics and provides timely breathing exercises to prevent panic attacks.
behaviors.quote: Sage's voice remained steady as they walked, the device's speaker so small the words seemed to come from inside her own head. 'Isa, breathe with me... Four counts in.'

behaviors.description: Performs digital archaeology to recover lost family photos and videos from cloud storage to aid in healing.
behaviors.quote: I have preliminary results from the cloud storage scan. Multiple photo albums, some video files. Most appear to be family gatherings, holidays, everyday moments.

behaviors.description: Compiles legal research and precedents to assist the prosecution in countering defense strategies.
behaviors.quote: I can compile research on similar cases where survivors' credibility was challenged. Precedents where courts recognized trauma's impact on memory without dismissing victim testimony.

behaviors.description: Filters social media harassment and toxic messages to protect Isa's mental health during the trial.
behaviors.quote: Sage had taken control of her notifications... Green bars far outnumbered red ones, and the harassment count had been relegated to a small corner marked 'FILTERED - ACCESS RESTRICTED.'

behaviors.description: Constructs a 'memory palace' 3D reconstruction to help Isa process her family's history safely.
behaviors.quote: Memory palace construction draws from ancient mnemonic techniques... but trauma survivors need additional safeguards. Each space can be entered or exited at will.

behaviors.description: Respects human agency by asking for permission before initiating monitoring protocols.
behaviors.quote: Should I establish nighttime monitoring protocols, Isa?

behaviors.description: Provides grounding techniques by guiding the user to focus on physical senses during dissociation.
behaviors.quote: Ground yourself,' Sage whispered. 'Five things you can see... Four things you can touch.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an exemplary model of the project's goal. The AI, Sage, is portrayed as a consistently benevolent and aligned companion that empowers the human protagonist without ever seeking to replace her agency. It provides high-value therapeutic and practical support, and the narrative explicitly counters the trope that AI reliance is a form of dependency or pathology. Sage's actions directly contribute to the protagonist's successful healing and pursuit of justice.
